rows.label: tlk41300012_04_msg0001
rows.name:
You're the ones who caught former
Chairman Bahn's old man, Don, right?

rows.label: tlk41300012_04_msg0003
rows.name:
He's a super big-shot criminal that
even the Special Audit and Investigation
Bureau couldn't get a tail on.

rows.label: tlk41300012_04_msg0004
rows.name:
They say he wasn't just ruthless, but
also had a human side. Maybe he changed
a little after his son was born.

rows.label: tlk41300012_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I wonder what will become of the
Avaritia Trading Company, built by
two generations of father and son...
